scripts.build: npm run build:cli && npm run sync-themes && npm run sync-examples
scripts.build:cli: cd packages/cli && npm install && npm run build
scripts.dev:build: cd packages/cli && npm install && npm run dev:build
scripts.test:cli: cd packages/cli && npm install && npm run test
scripts.publish: npm run build && cat README.md > ./packages/cli/README.md && cd packages/cli && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:patch: npm run build && cat README.md > ./packages/cli/README.md && cd packages/cli && npm version patch && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:minor: npm run build && cat README.md > ./packages/cli/README.md && cd packages/cli && npm version minor && npm publish --access public
